thread.title: Couple reveals pregnancy with twins in amazing photo with 452 IVF needles
thread.title_full: Couple reveals pregnancy with twins in amazing photo with 452 IVF needles

author: Bristol Palin
title: Couple reveals pregnancy with twins in amazing photo with 452 IVF needles
text:
This is s precious. A couple in Texas has struggled with infertility for two years… and now they have an announcement to make!! Lauren Walker shared her story, with a moving photo featuring two onesies and 452 needles used for her In-Vitro Fertilization treatments in a photo that has since gone viral on Facebook . “We prayed for 953 days…452 Needles, 1000’s of tears, 1 corrective surgery, 4 clomid/letrozole attempts, 2 IVF rounds, 3 failed transfers and & 1 Amazing GOD,” the yoga instructor wrote as a caption before explaining her inspirational journey. Walker, 28, had been trying to have a child with her high school sweetheart, Garyt, since 2014. 
So excited for the couple! The way they chose to tell the world is about the sweetest thing I’ve seen. 
Congrats!
